page.description: Returns either 'http://' or 'https://' depending on whether SSL is running.

return.name: Mode
return.description: Either "http://" or "https://" depending on whether SSL is running.

page.discussion: The A5_HTTP() function determines whether SSL is running. This is a useful function when you are constructing a URL. However, a more efficient way to determine if SSL was used for a request of an executing A5W page is to look at the value of ServerSetting.SSL_Enabled.

section.description: This example displays the ServerSetting.SSL_Enabled on an A5W page.
section.example: <%a5 ? serversetting.ssl_enabled %>
